hero.title: Saketh
hero.subtitle: Ashen Developer
hero.tagline: Bearer of Code, Seeker of Solutions

about.description: An Unkindled developer who refused to let bugs consume the flame. Tempered through countless deployments, shipping under pressure with the precision of a parry.
about.quote: Ashen one, hearest thou my voice? Bring me souls... I mean, clean code.
